title: 魔改矿物问题
author: nai_niu
txt_content: 服务器有格雷 热力 ic 想禁用除格雷以外的矿物 怎么解决

replies.author: 忆梦cat
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 忆梦cat 于 2019-9-6 16:09 编辑 

IC可以通过该配置文件关闭矿物生成IC2.ini[worldgen / copper]
; Enable generating this ore
enabled = false
[worldgen / lead]
; Enable generating this ore
enabled = false
[worldgen / tin]
; Enable generating this ore
enabled = false复制代码热力同样如此config\cofh\world\config.cfg# If TRUE, CoFH World will not generate features at all. This option is intended for use when you want another mod to handle ore generation but do not want to blank out the various .json files yourself. Flat Bedrock may still be used. [default: false]
    B:DisableAllGeneration=true复制代码
